remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。一/13:30~16:30，中研院跨領域大樓5B05會議室
remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. Monday. 13:30-16:30, 5B05

goal.ch: This course contains basic physics knowledge necessary for the understanding of modern nanoscience and nanotechnology. It is so designed as to lay a physical foundation for the students whose majors are Chemistry and Biology.
goal.en: This course contains basic physics knowledge necessary for the understanding of modern nanoscience and nanotechnology. It is so designed as to lay a physical foundation for the students whose majors are Chemistry and Biology.

outline.ch:
“Introduction:
 Systematic of Making Things Smalle ; What are limits to smallness
 Self-Assembled Nano-Structure in Nature and Industry-1; Self-Assembled Nano-Structure in Nature and Industry-2   Quantum Nature of the Nano-world
 Optical Electronics of Low-D Materials
 Practical work: visiting Nanomaterials Lab and Nano-Industry
 Physical-based Experimental Approaches to Nanotechnology-1;
Physical-based Experimental Approaches to Nanotechnology-2
 Nanomedicine-1 ;  Nanomedicine-2    Bio and Nano-Electronic
 Nano Materials for Photovoltaic   Nano Materials for Thermoelectric“
outline.en:
“Introduction:
 Systematic of Making Things Smalle ; What are limits to smallness
 Self-Assembled Nano-Structure in Nature and Industry-1; Self-Assembled Nano-Structure in Nature and Industry-2   Quantum Nature of the Nano-world
 Optical Electronics of Low-D Materials
 Practical work: visiting Nanomaterials Lab and Nano-Industry
 Physical-based Experimental Approaches to Nanotechnology-1;
Physical-based Experimental Approaches to Nanotechnology-2
 Nanomedicine-1 ;  Nanomedicine-2    Bio and Nano-Electronic
 Nano Materials for Photovoltaic   Nano Materials for Thermoelectric“

textbook.ch: “Edward L. Wolf: Nanophysics and Nanotechnology, An introduction to Modern Concept in Nanoscience (Wiley VCH, 2004)“
textbook.en: “Edward L. Wolf: Nanophysics and Nanotechnology, An introduction to Modern Concept in Nanoscience (Wiley VCH, 2004)“

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch: 系所:限物理學系碩士班、物理學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc  in Physics、PhD in Physics only.
